contentList.content: A being of large import They gain boss boosts from configuration.
A being of some import. They gain mini-boss boosts from configuration.
A character with experience in martial combat. They gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with Martial Weapons, in addition to boosts from configuration.
A character with a versatile skillset, who blends artistry, trickery, and spellcraft. They gain Bard boosts from configuration.
A character who commands the forces of nature, shaping the world with primal magic. They gain Druid boosts from configuration.
A character with raw arcane power, shaping magic through will alone. They gain Sorcerer boosts from configuration.
A character who wields eldritch magic granted by a supernatural patron. They gain Warlock boosts from configuration.
A character who masters the weave through study and intellect. They gain Wizard boosts from configuration.
A character with experience in spellcasting. They gain a 30% increase to their spell's range, in addition to Magic boosts from configuration.
A character who harnesses their fury to punish foes. They gain <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Interrupt_RecklessAttack">Reckless Attack</LSTag>, in addition to Barbarian boosts from configuration.
A character of faith, channeling divine magic both to aid and harm. They gain Cleric boosts from configuration.

A character who has mastered weapons and tactics, excelling in martial combat. They gain [1] <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Dice</LSTag>, in addition to Fighter boosts from configuration.
A character who has mastered body, mind and the art of combat. They gain Monk boosts from configuration.
A character who upholds or neglects a sacred oath, a warrior of divinity or demise. They gain Paladin boosts from configuration.
A character who blends martial prowess with nature's magic. They gain Ranger boosts from configuration.
A character who excels in stealth, strategy, and quick thinking. They gain <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SneakAttack">Sneak Attack</LSTag>, in addition to Rogue boosts from configuration.
A character with experience in spellcasting. They gain access to spellslots, and a variety of spells from configuration.
A character with experience in spellcasting. They gain access to spellslots, and a variety of spells from configuration.
A character with experience in spellcasting. They gain access to spellslots, and a variety of spells from configuration.
A character with experience in spellcasting. They gain access to spellslots, and a variety of spells from configuration.
A character with experience in spellcasting. They gain access to spellslots, and a variety of spells from configuration.
A character with experience in spellcasting. They gain access to spellslots, and a variety of spells from configuration.
They gain access to spells from configuration.
They gain access to spells from configuration.
They gain access to spells from configuration.
